what: Unpolished Test Case Of Main And Sub Modules In Shiny
title: Unpolished Test Case Of Main And Sub Modules In Shiny
text: shiny.moduler provides simple Shiny app controls underlying Shiny modules. deliberately unpolished – example, unit tests error checks app. create functionality? Well, found documentation Shiny stopped just prior point building main module control sub-modules, shared code hope test package might help others.

title: Unpolished Test Case Of Main And Sub Modules In Shiny
text: can install latest version shiny.moduler follows:

title: Unpolished Test Case Of Main And Sub Modules In Shiny
text: run app controls contains sub-modules, use: run sub-modules standalone basis, use:
code: library(shiny.moduler) app_main() library(shiny.moduler) app_sectors(standalone = TRUE) app_indicators(standalone = TRUE)
